scripts.build: tsc && git add . && git commit -m updates
scripts.patch: npm run commit && npm version patch && git push && npm publish --registry=http://static.qqlx.tech/verdaccio
scripts.minor: npm run commit && npm version minor && git push && npm publish --registry=http://static.qqlx.tech/verdaccio
scripts.major: npm run commit && npm version major && git push && npm publish --registry=http://static.qqlx.tech/verdaccio
